title: Tour of Flanders Favorites Report Card: Mighty MVDP, Who Knows with Wout, Luxuries for Lidl-Trek, Possibly Pithie?
content:
Who's hot and who's not ahead of Tour of Flanders? We pick apart E3 Saxo Classic and Gent-Wevelgem to dissect the top dogs for De Ronde.

Read the full article at Tour of Flanders Favorites Report Card: Mighty MVDP, Who Knows with Wout, Luxuries for Lidl-Trek, Possibly Pithie? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
